Oulipoidal Poegenic Potentiomat

games

Feb 7, 2015

 



i made a thing. the purpose of this thing is for you to make a thing also. y’know? so, make something! (And you should totally send me a screenshot of the thing that you make.)

what am i supposed to do with this

just type a word and press enter. repeat.

what else can i do with this

  • save your creation in browser (using localStorage) – save icon
  • load your previous saves – folder icon
  • shuffle da words – shuffle icon
  • move da words back to before you shuffled – undo icon
  • drag da words around
  • lock so that generated words do not overwrite existing words – lock icon
  • show or hide the inputs’ backgrounds – eye icon
  • add more inputs – plus icon
